def check(num):        
        if num%7==0:
            print num
            return
        elif (num-4)%7==0:
            print num-4
            return
        elif num<7:
            print -1
            return
        else:
            check(num-4)
        
import sys

for z in range(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
    num=int(sys.stdin.readline())
    check(num)
